texts.en: Ablavi, aged 46, is the mother of three and lives in Adakpamé to operate her business. She sells charcoal and makes a profit. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. To purchase sacks of charcoal, Ablavi has need of this loan to finance her order and to realize more profit for her household to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase 13 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Eberney

texts.es:
Eberney un hombre con 33 años de edad, con seis hijos de 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16 años, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres.

Su sueño es poder pagarle el la educación a sus hijos.

Con el crédito comprara insumos agrícolas al por mayor  como abonos, riegos, pesticidas y otros, con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha.

Impacta la vida de este hombre, y la de su familia con un préstamo.
texts.en:
Eberney is a 33-year-old man with six children, ages 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, and 16. He is hard-working and humble. When he was a boy, he learned to do all the farm tasks, thanks to the teachings of his parents.

His dream is to be able to pay for the education of his children.

With the loan, he will buy wholesale agricultural supplies, such as compost, irrigation, pesticides, and other items. With these, he will continue caring for his crops and will have a better harvest.

Impact the life of this man and that of his family with a loan!

loans.use: to buy compost, irrigation, pesticides, and other items.

loans.name: Pheap's Group

texts.en:
Pheap is aged 40 and a married mother of five children and only one among them is in school, living in Battambang province. The sources of her family’s income are from rice farming and as a paid worker. She has been involved in these businesses for more than ten years and it earns her about 24,400KHR per day. 

Due to her crop not doing well last year, it causes her to have not enough funds to do farming again for this season.  Because of this case, she is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy fertilizer and seeds. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seeds, for a better harvest this year

loans.name: Lanh's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lanh, born in 1962, is a Kinh ethnic woman. She current lives her husband and her son, her daughter-in-law and a child of her son, in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from doing the garden and breeding so their annual income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and saving a small amount of money. She wants to buy fertilizer for the grafted longan garden but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

She will try to work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time, and hoping that the loan amount will help her invest effectively in the longan garden, and then in the next harvest it will bring her family an abundant crop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her grafted longan trees, to ensure an abundant fruit harvest

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est une femme mariée qui est âgée de 30 ans et vit à Baguida avec trois enfants à sa charge. Akossiwa est une commerçante de pagnes à ses clients d’avoir le bénéfice afin de subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants. Akossiwa s’approvisionne six fois par mois au marché. Pour  commander des pièces de pagne, Akossiwa demande ce crédit pour financer son achat et avoir une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour réaliser ses attentes et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Akossiwa is a married woman, 30 years old, living in Baguida with her three children she supports. She is a merchant of 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa). She sells to her customers for a profit to meet the needs of her children. She gets her supplies six times a month at the market. To put in an order for lengths of ‘pagne’ cloth, Akossiwa is asking for this loan to finance her purchase  and to have a good profit margin, so as to meet her expectations and to enable a good education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 5 lengths of 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Revai

texts.en:
Revai is 28 years old and married with two children. She resides in Chikomba West District, Zimbabwe. Revai is now highly respected in her community and family because of the success of her business. She diversified her business into a grocery shop. She is using her profits to provide for her family. She successfully finished her loan repayments, paid school fees for six children in the family, and employed one shop attendant to assist her. 

She is requesting a second Kiva loan which she wants to use to expand her groceries business. She want to purchase more stock and make sure that she provide everything that is required by people in her community. 

She is known as a pillar of support in her community because of her volunteer work helping the elderly with the upkeep of their homes. She also volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide in schools to improve the well being of students.

Thank you for supporting her business!

loans.use: To purchase more groceries, to have a full supply for everyone in her community.

loans.name: Amah

texts.fr: Amah est une femme mariée  âgée de 34 ans. Amah vit à Baguida avec ses trois enfants. Amah est très dynamique et vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans le quartier. Cette activité l’aide à réaliser une bonne épargne et à soutenir son mari pour couvrir les charges de la famille. Pour disposer ses marchandises, Amah s’approvisionne dix fois par mois au marché. Amah demande ce crédit pour acheter des détergents pour alimenter son étalage afin d’avoir encore plus de bénéfice
texts.en: Amah is a married woman, 34 years old, living in Baguida with her three children. She is very energetic and sells grocery items in her district. This business help her to save some money and to support her husband in covering family expenses. To have merchandise, Amah stocks up ten times a month at the market. She is asking for this loan to purchase detergents for stocking her display of goods, so as to make more profit.

loans.use: to purchase 4 dozen of detergents

loans.name: Abigail

texts.en:
Abigail is 35 years old and married with two children. With one of her children in school, Abigail works very hard to provide for them.

Abigail runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products and other groceries.

Abigail has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Abigail would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Purisima

texts.en:
Purisima is 46 years old and married. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Purisima has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines. Purisima requested a PHP 6000 loan amount through NWTF to buy sacks of rice to sell for her business.

Purisima has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Purisima would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell for her business

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Analiza works hard to support her family.

She has a photo shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from  ageneral store. Analiza is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to  buy materials needed like bond paper, etc. for her photo shop business.

Analiza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed in her photo shop like bond paper, etc.

loans.name: Chanthy's Group

texts.en:
Chanthy is a 30-year-old mother of two children and earns a living through cassava growing. Sometimes, she works for others for a fee to gain extra income to support the family. She has been in this business for 8 years and the current business earns her about 53,000KHR per day to feed the family. Lack of working capital is the main challenge for her to better support the family’s business. 

Chanthy is the second cycled client with VisionFund. She wisely and successfully used her first loan from VisionFund to better support her family’s livings and business. As the leader, Chanthy is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her family’s income from the current business to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her cassava farmland

loans.name: Roque Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio un señor con 62 años de edad, casado, con tres hijas de 23, 25 y 34 años de edad, el cual viendo de un amigo aprendió hacer  varia clase de trabajos de confección, y a lo que está dedicado hoy en día.

Su sueño es seguir en su negocio y así mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
Con el préstamo comprara manteles y máquinas, lo  cual ayudara a que su negocio crezca.
Antonio es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable, día a día busca los recursos para sostener a su esposa.
Aporte a este sueño y haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Antonio is a 62-year-old man, is married, and has three daughters ages 23, 25 and 34. From a friend he learned to run a number of sewing workshops, which is how he makes a living today. His dream is to continue with his business, thus improving the conditions of his home. With the loan he will buy sewing machines, which will help his business to grow. Antonio is a very hardworking and responsible man; day after day he seeks the resources to support his wife.

Support this dream and make a loan.

loans.use: to buy cloth and sewing machines, which will help his business to grow

loans.name: Rosa  Francisca

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer muy alegre, que recibe el día a día con una sonrisa en su cara, luego de tener a sus tres hijos, decidió emprender un negocio de una pequeña pulpería, con el paso del tiempo su negocio ha ido progresando.
En la actualidad, los clientes cada vez demandan más productos a los negocios, es por eso que Rosa solicita un préstamo y así abastecerse y comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, detergentes, jabones, entre otros. Su principal objetivo es mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus seres queridos. En un futuro desea iniciar un negocio de venta de comida.
texts.en:
Rosa is a very happy woman who greets every day with a smile on her face. After having her three children, she decided to set up a business, a little grocery store, and with the passing of time, her business has been progressing.

Now customers increasingly request more products from businesses. It is for this reason that Rosa is applying for a loan to thus stock up and buy rice, beans, sugar, detergents, and soaps, among other items. Her principal goal is to improve her quality of life and that of her loved ones. In the future, she wants to begin a business of selling food.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, detergents, and soaps, among other items.

loans.name: Ma. Lolita

texts.en:
Ma. Lolita is 51 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, Ma. Lolita works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Lolita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, condiments, bread, beverages, and other groceries.

Ma. Lolita has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as biscuits, can goods, vinegar, soy sauce, candies, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Ma. Lolita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, condiments, bread, beverages and other groceries

loans.name: Ma. Thelma

texts.en:
Ma. Thelma is 42 years old and married with three children.

Ma. Thelma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, bread, personal product care, and other groceries.

Ma. Thelma has borrowed and paid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from buy and sell rice.

Ma. Thelma aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, bread, personal product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 23 years old and married with two children. Mary Ann works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like school supplies, home product care, and other groceries.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, biscuits, mineral water, candies, shampoo, and other groceries. 

In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like school supplies, home product care and other groceries

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Elena una señora con 45 años de edad, casada, con una hija de 11 años, dedicada a la marquetería desde hace pocos años.

El sueño que tiene es de algún día tener su propia vivienda.

Con el préstamo ella abastecerá su negocio de madrea y así poder seguir trabajando y sostener a su familia.

Su préstamo ayudara a Elena invertir en un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Elena is a 45 year-old woman, who is married with an 11 year-old daughter. For the past few years, she has made a living in the craft of wood decoration. 

Her dream is to one day have her own home. With the loan, she will supply her wood business and therefore be able to continue to work and support her family. 

Her loan will help Elena invest in a better future for her family.

loans.use: to supply her wood business and therefore be able to continue to work and support her family.

loans.name: April Gay

texts.en:
April Gay is 23 years old with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

April Gay has a buy and sell of charcoal business in the Philippines. April Gay requested a PHP 4,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

April Gay has been in this business for five years. In the future, April Gay would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Hoai's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoai, a Thai ethnic woman, joined the program of M7-MFI in January 2013. She currently lives with her husband and her son in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation and breeding, so the annual income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and save the small amount left. She wants to buy seeding-corn for the coming season but her savings is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

She hopes the loan will help her family invest in cultivation effectively with high productivity, and the coming harvest will bring a bigger yield as compared with last year's yield. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy seeding-corn

loans.name: Adriana Patricia

texts.es:
Adriana una señora de 29 años de edad, soltera, con 2 hijos de 9 y 6 años de edad tiene su propio negocio de confecciones en Medellín.
Su mayor sueño es poder pagar el estudio de sus hijos, se preocupa mucho por su bienestar.

Debido a que no cuenta con la ayuda del padre de sus hijos para el sostenimiento de los mismos ella solicita un crédito a la corporación interactuar con el fin de comprar más máquinas y tela para aumentar los ingresos.

Tu puedes hacer parte del sueño de Adriana, haz un préstamo.
texts.en:
Adriana is a woman of 29. She is single and has two children, ages 9 and 6. She has her own dressmaking business in Medellin. Her great dream is to be able to pay for the education of her children. She worries a lot about their well-being.

Because she doesn't have help from the father of her children for their support, she is applying to Interactuar Corporation for a loan, with the goal of buying more machines and fabric to increase her income.

You can be part of Adriana's dream -- make a loan!

loans.use: to buy more machines and fabric to increase her income.

loans.name: Sat's Group

texts.en: Residing in a rural area of Kampong Cham province, Sat is 38 years old and married. She has six beloved children who are still under her care and two of them are in school. Sat earns her living through farming cassava and growing rice. She has been involved in her current businesses for 18 years and it earns her about 50,900 KHR per day. Sat is a second-loan client with VisionFund.  She is leading a group to take a loan of 9,000,000 KHR in total. Sat, with her requested loan portion, will buy fertilizer and pesticide and pay labor fees to support her cassava farming. She believes that with the help of this loan, she can boost her income to improve the living standard of her family and she wants to create a new business growing cashews.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide and pay labor fees to support her cassava farming.

loans.name: Ludis Del Rosario

texts.es:
Ludís una señora con 43 años de edad, casada, madre de 2 hijos de 15 y 23 años de edad, trabaja en un negocio vendiendo mercancía en Cerete.
Su sueño es poder brindarle estudio a su hija menor
 
Con el préstamo quiere ampliar su negocio, y abastecerlo de mercancía, lo cual le genere más recursos para así contribuir con el sustento familiar.
Ludís es una mujer trabajadora y muy luchadora, su préstamo ayudara en un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Ludís is a woman of 43. She is married and is the mother of two children, ages 15 and 23. She works in a business selling merchandise in Cerete. Her dream is to be able to offer an education to her younger daughter.

With the loan, she wants to expand her business and stock it with merchandise, which will generate more resources for her to thus contribute to the family sustenance. Ludís is a very hard-working and striving woman. Her loan will help in a better future for her family.

loans.use: to stock her business with merchadise

loans.name: Thandiwe

texts.en:
Thandiwe is a 31-year-old businesswoman. She is married with two children living in the Chikomba West District of Zimbabwe. To support her community, Thandiwe is a Camfed Learner Guide volunteering at schools to disseminate health information and promote the reduction of HIV and AIDS.

Thandiwe’s poultry business is doing quite well. In addition to promptly repaying her loan, she is able to provide for her family by paying her three children’s primary school fees since she is the breadwinner of the family. She plans to expand her poultry business and start a grocery shop if she manages to get a second loan. She really wants to meet the demands for poultry and groceries in her community. She looks forward to receiving a second loan to expand and diversify her business.

Thank you for supporting her loan!

loans.use: to buy groceries for resale.

loans.name: Eli Noe

texts.es:
Eli Noe tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge en el caserío Playa Azul, en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajmarca, en la Sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Eli Noe se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde hace más de 10 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado así como la compra de accesorios para este, con esto Eli Noe espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Eli Noe is 29 years old, in a common-law relationship, and lives with his spouse in the small village of Playa Azul, in the Pucará district, located in the Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in the community is peaceful, and the residents work mainly in business and raising small livestock.

Eli Noe works providing transportation service to passengers with his vehicle (motorcycle taxi), a business that he has carried out for over 10 years. He has experience in this sector and very good personal and work references in his zone. The loan will be used to repair and maintain his vehicle, since it is currently in poor condition, as well as to buy accessories for his vehicle. With this, Eli Noe hopes to offer better service to his customers, which will generate greater income for him and thereby improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his vehicle, as well as buy accessories for it.

loans.name: Aladier De Jesus

texts.es:
Aladier en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió iniciar un negocio que según él le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Montara un negocio de tienda de abarrotes en su casa en el municipio de San Rafael, con el cual planea sostenerse a sí mismo y a su madre.
Su principal dificultad es la competencia en el sector y el alto costo del inventario para conseguir.

Para lograr esto, necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar un enfriador, estanterías, vitrinas y surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar como abarrotes, granos, galletas y otros alimentos para abastecer e iniciar su negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de un Colombiano con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Aladier, in his search for a promising future and good opportunities to get ahead, decided to start a business that, according to him, will give him everything he has ever dreamed of.

He will start a grocery store business in his house in the municipality of San Rafael, with which he plans to support himself and his mother.

His main difficulty is the competition of the sector and the high cost of obtaining inventory.

To achieve this, he needs the help of a loan with Corporación Interactuar that will allow him to buy a cooler, shelves, display cabinets, and a selection of basic family goods such as groceries, grains, cookies, and other foods to stock and begin his business.

Support the entrepreneurial dreams of a Colombian with a loan today!

loans.use: to buy a cooler, shelves, display cabinets, and a selection of basic family goods such as groceries.

loans.name: Dung's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Dung, born in 1983, is a Thai ethnic woman. Her family has four members, including her husband, her son, her daughter and her. They are living in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main occupation is farming so the income is just enough to cover the basic living expenses of the whole family and to save only a small amount of money.

Her husband is always sick so she has to do almost all the work at her house by herself. She intends to bring her husband to the hospital to check his health but she does not have enough money. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for her husband to have a medical check and treatment.

She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time, hoping that the loan will help her husband quickly recover from his illness and have good health.

loans.use: to pay for her husband's medical check and treatment.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 39 years old and married with three children. With one of her children in school, Christine works very hard to provide for them.

Christine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products, school supplies, etc.

Christine has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Christine would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products, and school supplies

loans.name: Claudia Monica

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer solidaria de 37 años de edad que busca a través de  un crédito una solución para tener una mejor entrada de dinero suficiente para sostenerse. 

Tiene una pequeña unidad productiva en su casa en la que vende calzado para dama, atiende a sus clientes siempre con un excelente servicio pues sabe que de estos depende la sostenibilidad de su negocio.

Trabaja 6 días a la semana durante 5 horas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de zapatos, sandalias y botas, pues desea aumentar su capacidad de inventario y así poder afrontar su principal dificultad que es la falta de capital.
texts.en: Claudia is a 37-year-old woman who by means of a loan is seeking a solution to have more income in order to support herself. She has a small work space in her home where she sells women's shoes. She always provides her customers with excellent service as she knows that the sustainability of her business depends on this. She works six days a week for five hours a day. She is asking for a loan to buy an assortment of shoes, sandals and boots, as she wants to increase her inventory capacity and thus confront her greatest problem, which is a lack of capital.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of shoes, sandals and boots, as she wants to increase her inventory capacity

loans.name: Do's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Do, born in 1963, is a Kinh ethnic woman. Her family has five members, including her husband, her son, her daughter-in-law, a child of her son and her. Her family is living in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main occupation is cultivation and breeding. The income from harvesting custard apples on 4,000 square meters of cultivated land is about VND 50 to 60 million. However, after deducting costs, the income is just enough to cover the living expense of the whole family and save a small amount of money. She wants to buy fertilizer for the coming custard apple crop but her savings are not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time, and hopes that the loan will help her family invest effectively in cultivation with high productivity, doubling last year's harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.
